comments.author: Xi
comments.content:
Using mendelian genetics, you could guesstimate your blood type if you know your parents, or go and donate blood where they will usually tell you or do what I did and take the final year applied genetics module at Imperial where you get your very own blood typing kit!! Unfortunately (or fortunately), the guy who ran that course is no longer there.

If they did genetic testing via blood samples, it'd be easy enough to find your blood type.

What your mild medical disease? Geekitus? Chronic nerdoplasia? Or Anime syndrome?
